thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Aramis Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice room, great location
thread.title_full: Nice room, great location - Review of BEST WESTERN Aramis Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: David N
title: Nice room, great location
text:
Room was cozy and very clean, well appointed. Location is ideal. In the 6th arr. and right by a metro station. Many shops in the area, and decent restaurants right nearby. Will consider staying here again. Staff was very friendly.
Room Tip: Ask for a room that does not face Rue de Rennes - it should be quieter. See more room tips
